channel.title: 3D Modeling on Jiayin
channel.description: Recent content in 3D Modeling on Jiayin

item.title: Chimecho and Flying Cat
item.description:
The models are pieced together by individual shapes. Individual components are created through their parametric equations.
Chimecho FShape { geometry FGeometry { definition "function frep(x,y,z,t){ head = 0.4^2 - (x)^2 - (y)^2 - z^2; top = 1 - (x/0.25)^2 - ((y-0.6)/0.1)^2 - (z/0.15)^2; bodyline = min( 1 -(z/0.05)^2 -(x/0.05)^2, min(0.5-y,y+1.5)); tail = min((((z+0.6)/0.8)^2 - (x/0.5)^2 - ((y+0.075)/0.5)^2),-0.1-z); topbody = max((max(max(head,top),bodyline)),tail); conebelow =min((((y+0.5)/1)^2 -(x/1)^2 - (z/0.4)^2),-y-0.5); rectangle = min( min (min(x+0.
